title: Chiefs coach fires back at Trump's criticism of NFL kickoff rule: 'I hope he hears it'
text: Kansas City Chiefs special teams coordinator Dave Toub fired back at President Donald Trump's criticism of the NFL's dynamic kickoff rules on Thursday.
summary: Kansas City Chiefs special teams coordinator Dave Toub fired back at President Donald Trump's criticism of the NFL's dynamic kickoff rules on Thursday.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
